definition: to recount in one's own words/autobiography/written self-introduction

sentences.english: Wake AHu, fasten readme named one of poison arrow tribal leaders.
sentences.chinese: 醒来的人自述名叫阿虎，系箭毒部落领袖之一。

sentences.english: Some patients complain of constant pain without real remission.
sentences.chinese: 有些病人自述疼痛持续而无真正缓解。

sentences.english: It is the author's self-description of his half life's academic achievements.
sentences.chinese: 本文为作者半生学术经历的自述。

sentences.english: Full details and installation instructions in the README file.
sentences.chinese: 全部细节和安装说明在自述文件。

sentences.english: Read Me User Interface Dialog Box.
Users do not have to read a Readme file before using your application.
sentences.chinese: 用户不必在使用程序前阅读自述文件。

sentences.english: Medical student self-reported levels of empathy tend to decrease with time spent in medical training.
sentences.chinese: 训练时间越长，医学生自述共情水平趋于下降。

sentences.english: A simple readme file is included in the download package.
sentences.chinese: 下载包中有一个简单的自述文件。

sentences.english: The Beatitudes offer us a self-portrait of Jesus.
sentences.chinese: 八福勾勒出耶稣的自述。

sentences.english: The readme explains how to properly set up the environment.
sentences.chinese: 自述文件说明如何恰当地设置环境。

sentences.english: For details on installing the package(s) please refer to the README file.
sentences.chinese: 有关安装软件包的详情，请参阅自述文件。

sentences.english: Previously diagnosed diabetes was determined on the basis of self-report.
sentences.chinese: 既往糖尿病的诊断基于患者自述。
自述式:我不明白那种行为。

sentences.english: The readme suggests that you avoid spaces in your install path.
sentences.chinese: 自述文件建议在安装路径中避免空格。

sentences.english: Well there you have it, narrative selves, situated selves invoking tradition.
sentences.chinese: 那么这里你们看了，求助于传统的自述。

sentences.english: Apply the update according to the readme file, and wait for this to finish as normal.
sentences.chinese: 请根据自述文件应用更新，并等候更新正常完成。

definition: confession/to make clear one's position or intentions/to brag
excerpt/selection (from a book)/to select/to choose an extract
to talk about/to narrate/to give an account
author's preface/autobiographical notes as introduction to a book
to talk from one's personal experience/to use oneself as an example
